description: Write a function that checks if `hostname` is an exact match or a subdomain of `parent_domain` (case-insensitive). Example (Match): is_subdomain("api.google.com", "google.com") -> 1. Example (Exact Match): is_subdomain("google.com", "google.com") -> 1. Example (No Match): is_subdomain("google.com.api.com", "google.com") -> 0.
